41: Select the amount of memory you require from the options below. The amount of memory you choose will determine your server’s performance and capacity to handle applications and workloads. Choose an option that best fits your intended use.
42: Select the number of CPU cores you require from the options below. The number of cores determines how many tasks your server can process simultaneously and directly affects overall performance. Choose an option that best suits the workload and applications you plan to run.
43: Select the amount of storage you require from the options below. The storage size determines how much data, files, and applications your server can hold. Choose an option that provides enough space for your current needs and allows room for future growth.
